Alfred: Sizing Assistant
Transform your online shopping with Alfred â€“ the smarter, simpler way to find your perfect fit! Alfred uses advanced machine learning to predict your ideal clothing size from over 30+ retailers, all with just a few basic details and a couple of body graphic selections from you.

Why Choose Alfred?

Effortless Sizing: Say goodbye to guesswork. Enter basic information, pick two body graphics, and let Alfred do the rest.
Broad Retailer Coverage: Enjoy accurate size predictions from a wide range of more than 30 trusted retailers.
Completely Free & Privacy-Friendly: Access Alfred's full features at no cost, with the assurance that we respect your privacy and don't sell your data.
Simple to Use:

Add Alfred to your Chrome browser.
Input your details and select body graphics.
Shop online as usual and get instant size recommendations.
Alfred is more than just an extension; it's your personal sizing assistant, designed to make online shopping smoother by providing well-informed size recommendations for your purchases.
